subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Homosexuality
lead_paragraph: King’s expected attendance at the Sochi Games was seen as a rebuke of Russia’s ban on so-called gay propaganda. She cited her mother’s failing health for the decision not to go.
snippet: King’s expected attendance at the Sochi Games was seen as a rebuke of Russia’s ban on so-called gay propaganda. She cited her mother’s failing health for the decision not to go.
